title: Curse of Still Valley
description: NIGHTMARE IN THE MORNINGKarla Martin Lonborg awoke to insanity, to a world gone completely mad. The body she wore seemed to be adjusted to this world, to know its way about - but her mind rejected what her body so readily accepted. It seemed that her mind was a prisoner in this body...a prisoner under sentence for a crime she could not remember.
author: Sharon Wagner
